text: "Every Woman in the World" is a 1980 song performed by English-Australian soft rock duo Air Supply. It was taken from their fifth studio album Lost in Love (1980). It went to number 3 in Canada, number 5 in the United States, number 7 in New Zealand and number 8 in Australia. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Air Supply songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Every Woman in the World
